title: We should stop playing the game
body: This game is bad and we should just stop playing it. I dont understand how half the player base hasn't quit yet becuase there is no way mor that 90% of people who play this are happy with it. Everyone knows its ass so stop playing it. oh and elo hell exists by the way no matter what and you all know it. stop playing and see riots reaction they will start flipping shit and add dumb shit into to the game to get people back like fortnite. stop playing, simple.
